name: Vin de Constance 1997
description: ‘Candied orange peel, cherries, and spices are intermingled with hints of honey in its gorgeously defined aromatics. This wine, produced entirely from Muscat, is lively, elegant, packed with nuanced flavours, and sports a long, supple, expressive finish.’  Pierre Rovani, Wine Advocate, 93/100 (Feb 2003)
